headline: Bernstein SocGen Holds $350 Target on LULU as of Early June, Citing China Strength Amid U.S. Weakness
summary: Bernstein SocGen’s Aneesha Sherman is holding its Outperform rating on Lululemon Athletica Inc. (NASDAQ: LULU), but kept the price target unchanged at $350.00. Even though the firm’s analyst is supportive of the company’s long-term strategy, they noted short-term headwinds in the U.S and cast doubt on near-term comparable sales growth. The analyst is skeptical that […]

headline: 4 Textile - Apparel Stocks to Watch Despite Industry Headwinds
summary: Despite a tough retail landscape, LULU, RL, UAA and HBI push forward with digital upgrades and brand-boosting strategies.
